effect.scarlet_violet: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.the_teal_mask: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.legends_za: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.mega_dimension: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.legends_za: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.mega_dimension: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
